title: Tourism stakeholders protest outside SLTDA
body_lines: The All-Ceylon Tourism Service Providers Association held a protest in front of the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority yesterday in Colombo against the current moves of the Government

The All-Ceylon Tourism Service Providers Association (ACTSPA) staged a protest outside the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority (SLTDA) demanding answers to the  difficulties  the industry is facing.

The protesters’ demands were to protect jobs, ensure uninterrupted supply of gas, fuel, power and other essentials. The protesters demands were also to implement the Tourism Act and keep the industry away from politics.
